org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv

Class CSVDataSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv.CSVBase
      • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv.CSVDataSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSink
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemporalCSVDataSink

    public class CSVDataSink
extends CSVBase
implements DataSink
    A graph data sink for CSV files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CSVDataSink

        public CSVDataSink(String csvPath,
                   GradoopFlinkConfig config)
        Creates a new CSV data sink. Computes the meta data based on the given graph.
        Parameters:
        csvPath - directory to write to
        config - Gradoop Flink configuration

      • CSVDataSink

        public CSVDataSink(String csvPath,
                   String metaDataPath,
                   GradoopFlinkConfig config)
        Creates a new CSV data sink. Uses the specified meta data to write the CSV output.
        Parameters:
        csvPath - directory to write CSV files to
        metaDataPath - path to meta data CSV file
        config - Gradoop Flink configuration
